articles.title: Village house
articles.contents:
How to get Ontopo?
Check final destination before deciding to visit Pirveli Ontopo
The village Ontopo is part of the Abasha Municipality
From Kutaisi International Airport
What to explore around Ontopo
📍 Konstantine Gamsakhurdia House Museum - Location, Info
📍 Nokalakevi Fortress - Location, Info
📍 Hot sulfur spring - Location
📍 Balda Canyon - Location, Info
📍 Martvili Canyon - Location, Info
🏊️ Swimming places - Tekhuri river
Tast local food
